description: Sunrise chimes, temple bells, coastal lullabies—songs that stroll Puri's sands and streets.

items.name: Sri Jagannath Puri Temple
items.description: Believed to be one of the most impressive monuments of the state, Sri Jagannath Puri Temple is dedicated to Lord Jagannath (Lord of the universe and incarnation of Vishnu). Moreover, this temple holds the utmost religious significance among the Hindus and was constructed by the famous Ananda Verman Chodaganga Dev. Termed as one of the best tourist places in Puri, this richly carved structure is constructed on a high pedestal with four gigantic gates.

items.name: Puri Beach
items.description: A silent paradise for nature seekers, Puri Beach is located on the east coast of the Bay of Bengal. Positioned in close proximity to Jagannath Temple and other renowned temples of Puri, this beach near Bhubaneshwar attracts a large number of tourists. The sun-kissed beach is an apt destination to enjoy a perfect vacation with your family and friends. Also, the honeymooners can stroll along the breezy shores and explore the mesmerizing view of sunrise and sunset. This is one of the top tourist spots in Puri and makes your vacation more memorable.

items.name: Chilika Lake
items.description: Asia's largest salt-water lagoon, Chilika Lake is stretched across three districts(Puri, Ganjam, and Khordha in Orissa) and is separated by a narrow neckline from the waters of the Bay of Bengal. Dotted with many small islands of lush green natural beauty, this lake is positioned approximately 50kms from Puri. Enjoy the beauty of the flocks of flying migratory birds during the winter season. Apart from bird watching, this lake is also famous for boating, fishing, and many other things. So don't miss to explore this spot which is one of the outstanding tourist places in Puri.

items.name: Markandeshwar Temple
items.description: Positioned near Bindu Sagar, Markandeshwar Temple is one of the holy temples in Puri that was constructed during the 13th century. The figure of Natraj with 10 arms is studded in the Chaitya window and is located at the front of the temple. Images of Goddess Parvati, Lord Muruga, and Sri Ganesh are intricately carved and are placed in front of the sanctum. With its divine ambience, this temple houses fifty-two sacred shrines of Lord Shiva that is praiseworthy. If you are truly seeking solace and peace, then this shrine is one of the most famous places to visit in Puri.

items.name: Khandagiri Caves
items.description: Positioned within 7 km from Bhubaneswar, Khandagiri Caves was built around the 2nd century BC by King Kharavela. The carvings draw its influences from history and mythology. The most important section to be emphasized is the depiction of the Kalinga War, where women and teenagers are depicted fighting to save their motherland from Ashoka's army. If you want to explore the architecture of caves then Khandagiri caves are one of the best places to visit near Puri.

items.name: Atharnala Bridge
items.description: This is one of the best picnic spots in Odisha. Spanning over 85 meters and a breadth of 11 meters, Atharanala Bridge features 18 arches ranging from seven to 16 feet. Also, this bridge offers a stunning view of the Jagannath Temple. The façade of this Atharnala Bridge is decked with reliefs of deities, nayikas, genre scenes, and floral decorations. Further, this bridge is made up of Laterite and lime mortar with ashlar masonry building technique.

items.name: Gundicha Temple
items.description: Positioned in the centre of the beautiful garden, Gundicha Temple is enclosed within compound walls on all sides. Srimandira is about 3 km from this area and the two temples are located at the two rear ends. Marked as one of the top places to visit in Puri, Gundicha Temple is an ideal place to enhance your spirituality. If you are searching for spiritual awakening, then this is one of the sought-after and unique places to visit in Puri Odisha.

items.location_hint: Raghurajpur Rd, Raghurajpur, Jagannath Ballav, Odisha 752012

items.location_hint: New By-Pass, Mangarajpur Square, front of Batamangala Temple, Puri, Odisha 752002
